title: Horizonte acquires Glencore's Brazil nickel project for $8 mln
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Sep 28, 2015, 09:46 BST - UK Markets close in 6 hrs 44 mins Horizonte acquires Glencore's Brazil nickel project for $8 mln Reuters - UK Focus – 2 hours 3 minutes ago 1.205 -0.115 
Sept 28 (Reuters) - Horizonte Minerals (LSE: HZM.L - news ) said on Monday it had bought Glencore (Xetra: A1JAGV - news ) 's Araguaia nickel project in Brazil for $8 million. 
"This is a game-changing transaction for Horizonte. We have been able to negotiate a unique transaction leveraging the current depressed commodity markets," Horizonte CEO Jeremy Martin said in a statement. 
A Glencore spokesman said the deal was part of the company's plan to dispose of non-core assets. 
London-listed Horizonte is a Brazil-focused nickel development company.
